Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 by us, reflecting its unique features and the time and resources invested in its creation. Given its unparalleled capabilities and benefits, I believe it would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product for $10000. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
